## Training Resources

A curated set of learning resources for data stewardship, reproducible workflows, and salmon assessment support.

### Core skills

- [Version Control with Git (Software Carpentry)](https://swcarpentry.github.io/git-novice/)
- [Data Analysis and Visualization in R for Ecologists](https://datacarpentry.org/R-ecology-lesson/)
- [Data Analysis and Visualization in Python for Ecologists](https://datacarpentry.org/python-ecology-lesson/)

### Domain and policy context

- [Introduction to stock assessment (DFO)](https://www.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/science/species-especes/fisheries-halieutiques/assessment-evaluation/index-eng.html)
- [Canada School of Public Service Catalog](https://www.csps-efpc.gc.ca/catalogue/topics-eng.aspx)
- [Microsoft Learn](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/browse/)

:::
